editorialSummary.text: Modern lodging with free Wi-Fi & breakfast, plus 5 restaurants, an outdoor pool & a gym.

text.text:
I had expected a far better experience from a property that claims to be a five-star hotel, but unfortunately, my stay left much to be desired.

I had requested a room change shortly after check-in due to the unpleasant view from the window — the first thing visible was a dumped garbage area, which had become even worse and mucky due to rain. It was not only unpleasant to look at but also affected the overall feel of the room. Additionally, since the room was on a lower floor facing another building, we had to keep our curtains closed all the time to maintain privacy — which completely defeated the purpose of a relaxing, well-lit room.

I spoke with a representative over the phone who assured me that the team would call me back regarding the room change — no one ever did. I also raised the issue at the reception counter and while the staff there was willing to help, by then half of my stay was already over, making the change pointless.

Another concern was the food pricing and quantity. While I understand and accept premium pricing at such properties, the portion sizes were surprisingly small — not sufficient even for two people. If the prices are on the higher end, then the quantity should justify it.

Overall, apart from the entrance and lobby area which gives a five-star impression, the rest of the experience did not live up to the standards one would expect from such a property. Basic guest comfort and proactive service were clearly lacking.

I hope the management takes this feedback seriously and works on addressing these issues — both in terms of room allocation transparency and service responsiveness.

text.text:
I recently travelled and stayed in the hotel along with my Kid, while doing the reservation it was clearly mentioned that child below 16 years are complementary but when I asked for an extra mattress for my 11 years old son, I was surprised to hear that it's chargeable because they said your 11 years old son can sleep in between me and my wife on the bed, so I had to stand and argue at the reception for atleast 1 hour and the staff was also arguing but I strictly stood on my point and didn't pay anything extra, but it was the moment when you get to know the hospitality level, so the level of hospitality is not upto the mark, so I would suggest dont go with an impression of a 4/5 star hotel as the hospitality is not even as of 3 star, also the view is beach side but it is slight up than a budget hotel and not at all near to even a 4 star hotel. The breakfast is also average and so are the other facilities, swimming pool is also average and not so great. The lifts were smelling with some smoking like smell, the staff was rarely smiling and seems to be least bothered.
Overall experience is a kind of 2/5 star, don't expect any feel of a luxury hotel and expect a slightly upper than the normal budget hotel, as the Novotel Brand may sound very luxury but this property is no where close to its standards.

text.text:
We left a pair of ear rings on the bedside table right before checkout (we know this with 100% certainty, no doubt). We realized within 15 mins of leaving the property that it was left behind. Considering the hotel of this stature we expected the lost and found/hotel management to have promptly acted on the request. But it was never found and neither were we informed till we called back again after an hour and a half.
We later found out that the reception had also not informed housekeeping about the exact location of the lost item (beside table)
Not shifting blame - totally admit that leaving something behind was our fault. Low rating to reflect that we expected better from this hotel. Even if it was a prompt call to convey to us that they did not find the lost item - given it was expensive.

editorialSummary.text: High-end hotel with sea views & multiple restaurants, plus a spa, an outdoor pool & a hot tub.

text.text:
Our stay at the Taj Lands End was absolutely exceptional – far beyond perfect! The location is truly stunning, offering breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea and the iconic Worli Sea Link. Our room was incredibly spacious and well-appointed with all the luxury amenities one could desire. The staff were consistently polite and provided top-notch hospitality throughout our stay.

What truly stood out was the beautifully designed kids' area. The inclusion of the small rabbit enclosure, fish pond, and bird area was a unique and delightful touch that our children absolutely loved. It created a wonderful atmosphere for them. Staying here felt like an escape from the hustle and bustle of Mumbai, allowing us to spend quality time with our family in a serene and luxurious setting. We highly recommend the Taj Lands End for a memorable and rejuvenating experience.

text.text:
I had a not so good experience during my stay from 29th to 30th June 2025 (Sunday & Monday). I had booked 2 rooms and asked for an early Check in. I reached the Hotel by 1pm. I was given one room around 2pm which was a twin bed, while I had booked for a King bed. My family was sitting in the allotted room for almost 2 hours uncomfortably. After much follow up, I was given one room with king bed and had again to wait for another room for a while. Finally I got second room around 3.45 pm.I had plans to take rest and go for a swim in the pool, but because of the delayed check in, all my plans went for a toss. One of the rooms allotted had an uncleaned window therby obstructing the sea view for which I had specifically booked.

Next day morning, for breakfast at 9.30 am, there were 15 people waiting in the line outside the restaurant. We were asked to go to the other restaurant below. I had asked for a table for 5 which was given with 5 chairs and  only 4 table mats. Had to again wait for sometime requesting them to put the mat and the cutlery. Most of the food items were not even warm. Taste was just so so. Had to wait for bowls for sambar.

Overall, our high expectations of a great weekend at a reputed hotel was not satisfactory.

text.text:
I’m currently staying at Hotel Lalit and unfortunately, the experience so far has been far from what one expects from a so-called 5-star property. The service has been consistently poor — dialing ‘0’ for assistance goes unanswered, the front desk is uninterested and slow, and overall responsiveness is lacking.

One of the restaurants was entirely empty, with no staff in sight. I had to physically walk over to an adjacent space to find someone to serve. The soda was served warm, and when questioned, staff candidly admitted that cost-cutting measures were the reason behind such lapses. And did nothing about it! It was evident they were not expecting guests, which is alarming for any hospitality business, let alone one advertising itself as a premium hotel.

The furniture feels dated, and while the bathrooms are acceptable, nothing about the property justifies a 5-star rating. If this hotel had claimed to be a 3-star, I wouldn’t have felt compelled to leave a review — my expectations would have been set accordingly. But this level of service and preparedness is simply misleading and unacceptable under a 5-star banner. In the age of digital bookings, we rely on pictures and rating to make our decisions.

That said, I do feel for the staff trying to make do in an environment clearly hampered by underinvestment and poor management decisions. The issue here isn’t their intent, but a system that leaves them unsupported and guests disappointed.

Would not recommend unless major improvements are made — or unless you’re booking with 3-star (or 2.5) expectations.

text.text:
We recently stayed at The Lalit Mumbai and, unfortunately, it fell short of expectations. While it may have once been a 5-star property, it no longer feels like one.

The rooms are quite outdated, and the bathroom was particularly concerning — there was visible pink slime in the shower and around the sink, which suggests bacterial growth (likely pseudomonas). It makes you question whether proper cleaning agents like bleach are being used by housekeeping.

I booked a room for two adults and a child via Booking.com, clearly mentioning all specifications, yet was unexpectedly charged extra upon check-in. The front desk staff were unwelcoming and not helpful at all, which left a sour first impression.

On a positive note, the concierge team was excellent — helpful, professional, and truly the highlight of our experience in terms of service.

We arrived late around 11pm and opted for room service. Unfortunately, the food was cold, and no condiments were provided with our side of fries. The egg sandwich, spaghetti, and paneer dish were all underwhelming in terms of quality and presentation.

During checkout, I overheard another guest also voicing complaints, which confirmed that our experience wasn’t isolated.

Overall, this hotel seems more deserving of a 3-star rating at most. It’s disappointing to see how much it has declined. For the premium prices charged, guests should expect much better standards across the board

text.text:
🌟 Excellent Stay at Hotel Sahara Star!

I had a really pleasant experience staying at Hotel Sahara Star during my recent trip. From the moment I arrived, the staff was welcoming and efficient—check-in was smooth and quick. The room was spacious, spotlessly clean, and well-maintained with all the basic amenities you’d expect. The bed was comfortable, and I appreciated the quiet atmosphere after a long day of travel.

The location is unbeatable—right across from the bus stand, which made getting around super convenient. I also liked that they had an in-house restaurant with decent food. Breakfast was simple but tasty, and the service was prompt. Special thanks to the front desk staff, especially Santhosh, who was polite and always ready to help with any queries.

What stood out most was the value for money. For the price, you get excellent service, comfort, and convenience. I’d definitely recommend Hotel Sahara Star to anyone looking for a reliable.

Would happily stay again!

text.text:
I had an amazing experience at Hotel Sahara Star, located right opposite Mumbai Domestic Airport. From the moment you step into the hotel, you’re greeted with warm hospitality and a stunning ambience. The iconic dome structure and the beautiful indoor lagoon with live fish create a truly unique and relaxing atmosphere.

The rooms are spacious, clean, and well-equipped with modern amenities. The bed was super comfortable, and the view of the airport runway added an exciting touch to the stay. The soundproofing is excellent – you feel close to the airport without the noise.

The dining options are exceptional – from global cuisines to authentic Indian flavors. Especially loved the experience at Mabruk and Ocean – The Private Dining Room with its aquarium setting. The breakfast buffet is lavish with plenty of variety for all tastes.

The staff deserves a special mention – they are extremely courteous, attentive, and go the extra mile to make your stay memorable.

Whether you’re visiting for business, leisure, or a special occasion, Sahara Star offers everything you’d expect from a five-star experience. Highly recommended for a luxurious and comfortable stay in Mumbai!

The rooms are spacious, clean, and well-equipped with modern amenities. The bed was super comfortable, and the view of the airport runway added an exciting touch to the stay. The soundproofing is excellent – you feel close to the airport without the noise.

The dining options are exceptional – from global cuisines to authentic Indian flavors. Especially loved the experience at Mabruk and Ocean – The Private Dining Room with its aquarium setting. The breakfast buffet is lavish with plenty of variety for all tastes.

The staff deserves a special mention – they are extremely courteous, attentive, and go the extra mile to make your stay memorable.

Whether you’re visiting for business, leisure, or a special occasion, Sahara Star offers everything you’d expect from a five-star experience. Highly recommended for a luxurious and comfortable stay in Mumbai!

Overall, this hotel and its restaurant exceeded my expectations. I would gladly stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for quality service and hospitality.

text.text:
I stayed at this Hilton property for one night on the 8th of May with my husband and child- overall, the experience was disappointing and caught me by surprise.
The "city view" room was dark and depressing -from the window we could see the side of another building and some construction- should more properly be classified as "no view" so that visitors come with the right expectation. It was clean, but overpriced for what it was.
Secondly, the buffet dinner at the Brasserie had a very limited menu, at a price point for which you can get far more in this city. It only makes sense for corporate travellers who are not paying out of pocket, and indeed, most of the guests  we saw dining around us seemed to fit this category. The breakfast was good.
I will commend the staff for their hospitality and helpfulness, from the front desk to the restaurant.
The location is good for the airport, but next time I would choose from one of the many other options around. Overall, disappointing and overpriced for what it was, and not the standard of Hilton.

text.text:
Greetings of the day!
I stayed at the Hilton Hotel for one day during a work trip, and I had a truly pleasant experience. I would especially like to appreciate Chris Borges from the in-room dining service for his outstanding hospitality.

Chris Borges went above and beyond his service was prompt, professional, and very courteous. Along with delivering my order with care, he also gave his time to guide me about some nearby tourist attractions, which added a personal touch to my short stay. Despite being in town for work, I was able to explore a few local spots thanks to his helpful recommendations.

A big thank you to Chris Borges and Hilton team for making my stay comfortable and memorable. Highly recommend the hotel.

text.text: Truly A GEM! One of the best 5 star hotels near the airport that actually maintain 5 star standards while still being more affordable than others. This is a newer property with several Instagrammable spots like their pool and garden. Reception attends to you immediately and Nilesh in particular is very helpful when it comes to reservations and any adjustments that may be needed. The rooms are well designed and love that the shower has a door and a high divider so water doesn’t spill out when taking a shower. Breakfast is a FULL LUXURY experience with endless options catering to multicultural taste palettes and each item is authentically cooked. Dee in the breakfast area is super kind and helpful and honestly goes above to offer any assistance needed. I really appreciated that the breakfast staff allowed me to take breakfast to my room while I was unwell so I could eat at a slower pace. Housekeeping is PHENOMENAL…they tidy and clean your room as meticulously as shown in the book, “The Girl with a Pearl Earring” where it’s cleaned while keeping your things as you would want to find them. A small suggestion for improvement would be consistent temperature across different spaces and perhaps a bit more attention to non spicy food requirements by in room dining which was fixed immediately after mentioned. Overall, I truly enjoyed my stay and would recommend to everyone! The staff here really does an incredible job to make the stay as wonderful as possible for each guest. Hands down this is the 5 star experience you don’t want to miss!

text.text:
It’s a five-star hotel, so I’ll skip the basics.

What truly stood out for me was their buffet breakfast—an absolute favourite. The spread featured a great variety of cuisines, with frequent changes that kept things exciting and fresh. Extra points for a separate gluten free section which included bread, cake and a few other things.

Special mention to the staff, Aarti and Sonal—I stayed for 10 days, and every single morning, I made it a point to start my day there. A healthy breakfast, a happy tummy, warm and welcoming people, and a beautiful green space—it all came together to give my day the perfect start.

Few feedbacks:
1. The naturally GF items (boiled eggs, sausages) are kept on a wheat chapati to keep it soft - contaminating it with gluten. Can be changed.
2. Can make seeds (chia, pumpkin, sunflower) a regular feature instead of once in a week

I had a wonderful stay at Hotel Bloom in Worli. The location is excellent—close to key business areas and easily accessible. The rooms were modern, comfortable, and well-maintained. I was especially impressed by the cleanliness and attention to detail.

A special mention to Mr. Santosh Bait from the housekeeping team for his outstanding service. He ensured my room was spotless every day and went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed. His professionalism and friendly attitude truly made a difference in my stay.

Highly recommended for both business and leisure travelers. Will definitely be staying here again!

text.text:
I stayed here for two weeks in a Standard Queen room with modified American Plan. I must say - this hotel was one of the rare experiences in India I've had where the services and amenities offered were of international standards (reminded me of my time in Singapore!).

The entire hotel and the rooms were clean and tidy, the room service crew were pleasant in nature. The room design and bathroom were elegant with a yellow aesthetic touch to it. Special shout out to Mr. Santosh Bait who kept cleaning my room everyday even when I forgot to put the tag outside my room.

The breakfast buffet was the best that I could ask for. After ordering the same item for 2-3 days, Mr. Nousadh understood to prepare it just by my gentle nod. Also the dinners that were covered under the plan were delicious. I must have tried 10 different items and all of them were top-notch.

Overall opinion - Strongly recommended 💛

text.text:
I had a truly wonderful stay at this hotel and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for comfort, convenience, and great service. From the moment I arrived, the staff was welcoming, friendly, and eager to help. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and I was in my room within minutes.

The room itself was spotlessly clean, well-maintained, and thoughtfully designed. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the linens were fresh and of high quality. I particularly appreciated the small touches like complimentary bottled water, a well-stocked minibar, and a spacious bathroom with premium toiletries.

The location of the hotel is excellent—close to local attractions, shopping, and public transport, yet peaceful enough for a good night’s sleep. The breakfast buffet offered a wide variety of fresh and delicious options, catering to both international and local tastes.

What truly set this hotel apart, though, was the level of service. Every staff member I encountered was polite, attentive, and genuinely seemed to care about the guests’ experience.

Overall, this hotel exceeded my expectations in every way. I left with only positive memories and look forward to staying here again on my next visit. Truly a home away from home!

And special thanks to the front desk person Mr.Prashant. He is very polite and humble person

text.text:
I had work in Worli for a day and looked for a hotel to stay near by to the location of work. I came across Bloom Hotel on Google and checked the reviews and room images. From my understanding the room images look like they were taken at the time the hotel was just established. Cause I realised after we arrived there, that the rooms were not maintained and looked old. The reception and corridors have a bad odour. I had breakfast include in my booking which we decided to skip, as we just wanted to leave the establishment as quickly as possible.

I regret not putting in a few more thousands for a room in a better hotel. If I have to compare this three star hotel to other three star hotels like Tata’s Ginger, then Ginger is a ‘five star’ compared to the room we stayed in at the Bloom Hotel, for a much cheaper rate.

The AC only functioned at one slow speed, even putting it on the ‘turbo’ setting made no change in the fan speed and cooling, my guesses are is that the AC is rigged. There is also no elevator. And only one pair of room slippers for two guests in a queen room.

I’m not sure about the positive reviews I’ve seen here on Google, because to me, it feels like those guests stayed at a completely different hotel. I feel duped into believing them, which led me to make this booking.

To the hotel owner: Please take this opportunity (“take this chance you are given”) to use your revenue for the upkeep of your hotel so it is in par with other hotels in the same grade.

Guests consistently commend its picturesque beachfront location, offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea. The hotel is celebrated for its exemplary hospitality, with staff known for their professionalism, warmth, and attention to detail. Culinary excellence is another hallmark, particularly the expansive breakfast buffet and high-quality in-house dining options. The property boasts superior amenities including a well-equipped fitness center, serene spa, inviting pools, and exclusive Executive Lounge access. Furthermore, its family-friendly atmosphere, with dedicated children’s activities and services, makes it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers seeking luxury with personalized service.

text.text:
One of My Best Stays – Thank You, JW Marriott!

This is my first detailed review, and it’s going to be a long one — but that’s because my experience with JW Marriott was truly exceptional.

From the moment we arrived, everything about the hotel impressed us — the location, the ambiance, and the attention to detail in every nook and corner. I especially want to highlight the Sauna and the Breakfast Buffet, both of which were absolutely top-notch.

However, this review isn’t just about the facilities.

What truly stood out was the incredible service during a time of need. During our stay, my wife fell ill, and I had a flight scheduled for 9:00 PM. I requested a late check-out to accommodate her rest and recovery — and the hotel graciously agreed without hesitation. This small gesture made a huge difference to us, and I am extremely thankful for the compassion and flexibility they showed.

A special thanks to Andrez, Jivanth, and Lalit — your professionalism and kindness did not go unnoticed. You truly represent the best of Marriott’s values.

Special Mention to Martin
Thank you again, JW Marriott, for making our stay so comfortable and memorable!

text.text:
JW Marriott Juhu has been one of my favourite stays in the past — I’ve had a full sea view room before, and the experience was truly top-notch. That’s why I chose it again for a special celebration — our birthday and anniversary stay.

This time, I booked over a phone call and clearly mentioned our wish for a full sea view room. Unfortunately, the staff didn’t communicate the room details properly. We ended up with a partial view, and worse — the window was dirty, making the view even less enjoyable. Despite informing the reception, no action was taken, which was disappointing for a returning guest on a special occasion.

That said, there were some clear highlights:
•	The spa was exceptional — from the sauna, steam, cold bath, whirlpool jacuzzi, to the relaxation room, everything was serene, clean, and truly therapeutic. The staff there deserves appreciation for their warm and attentive service.
•	The swimming pool was another plus — especially the saltwater pool, which was a refreshing and unique experience.
•	The breakfast spread was fantastic — a great mix of Indian and international options, fresh fruits, juices, live counters, and excellent coffee. A perfect start to the morning.

Overall, while parts of the stay were memorable, the room experience and lack of proactive service left us a little let down — especially as returning guests celebrating something personal. Still, the property has its charm, and hopefully, with better communication, future stays can be closer to the standard we once loved.

editorialSummary.text: Relaxed hotel offering an outdoor pool, a spa & a fitness room, plus dining & a bar.

text.text:
If you’ve ever wanted to feel invisible, irrelevant, and mildly insulted all at once, welcome—you’ve found your sanctuary. The staff have truly mastered the art of ignoring guests with Olympic-level commitment. Smiles? Nonexistent. Helpfulness? Laughable. Hospitality? Must’ve gotten lost on the way here.
In-room dining? A joke. You’ll call. No one answers. Call again—still nothing. If by some miracle someone does pick up, don’t get too excited. That’s just the beginning of your slow descent into starvation. You could order dinner and still have time to write your will before it arrives. Maybe.
The only thing impressive here is how proudly they deliver such consistent disrespect. No warmth, no urgency, no care—just vibes and a strong sense that you’re bothering them by existing.
Clean rooms? Yes. But clean doesn’t cancel out crap service.
Would I come back? I’d rather eat cardboard in a bus station.

text.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Lemon Tree Premier Hotel, Mumbai is one of the best properties to stay in the city, especially if you’re looking for comfort and convenience near the airport. The location is excellent – just a few minutes away from Mumbai International Airport, which is perfect for business travelers or those with early/late flights.

Rooms are spacious, clean, and modern, offering great comfort and amenities. The staff is polite and service is prompt. The hotel maintains good hygiene standards and has a warm, welcoming vibe.

Rates usually range between ₹7,000–₹8,000 per night including breakfast, which is quite reasonable for the quality offered. The breakfast spread is nice with a decent variety of Indian and continental options.

Overall, a great value-for-money hotel with everything you need for a comfortable and stress-free stay in Mumbai. Highly recommended!

editorialSummary.text: Polished property offering modern rooms, 2 restaurants & a bar, plus a rooftop pool & a spa.

text.text:
Stayed at Holiday Inn Sakinaka, Mumbai, and it was a seamless blend of comfort, convenience, and warm hospitality. Located close to the airport and metro station, it's perfect for both business and leisure travelers.

The rooms are well-maintained, modern, and equipped with all necessary amenities. The bed was super comfortable, and the soundproofing ensured a peaceful sleep despite being in a busy area. The bathrooms were clean and spacious, with a great shower experience.

One of the standout features is the rooftop pool — a serene spot to unwind with a view of the city skyline. Whether you're taking a quick dip or just relaxing by the side, it adds a luxurious touch to the overall stay.

The buffet breakfast had a wide spread — from Indian to continental — and everything tasted fresh. The in-house restaurant serves delicious meals, and the room service was prompt.

The staff is polite, professional, and helpful, always ready to assist with a smile. Check-in and check-out were quick and hassle-free.

The gym and other facilities are decent and functional, making it a good all-round experience. The ambience of the lobby and dining area also gives a classy, premium vibe.

text.text:
Had stayed at this place last year when I visited Mumbai for the Tata Lit Fest. It's at a walkable distance from Gateway. Decent breakfast and dinner options available. Room had huge windows and good height which gave it a bright and spacious aura esp for me who easily feels claustrophobic. Food tasted good (however the room service guy charged more than what the menu card mentioned)

During checkout I left my watch and rings in the hotel room. The guy at the reception was extremely helpful to keep these safe till I returned to collect them. The watch was a precious gift from a loved one hence was really grateful to the reception guy to keep it safe. Guidance with respect to modes of travels and places was also appreciable.
Will definitely visit again.

text.text:
The hotel and staff are both excellent. The behavior of the staff is very calm and polite. They treat their customers with great care and guide them through everything without any confusion or hassle. I really appreciated that they were genuine and honest from the moment I arrived.

As soon as I reached the entrance, I was warmly welcomed and invited to sit down, since I had traveled a long distance. They offered me a bottle of water, which was a thoughtful gesture. About five minutes later, a staff member came to collect my details and informed me that my room was ready. She politely asked for my ID cards and then personally guided me to the room.

The food was quite impressive—delicious and varied. The hotel offers a wide range of meals, beverages, sweets, and snacks, all of which were included in my booking.

Overall, my experience with the hotel and its staff was very positive. A special thanks to Miss Archita, who was exceptionally calm and polite. She handled the guests beautifully and made the entire process smooth and welcoming.

text.text:
I recently stayed at The Leela Mumbai, and while the property is stunning and well-maintained, a few things left me thinking twice before I book again.

✅ What stood out (and deserves applause):
•	Citrus – Breakfast Buffet: Exceptional. The spread, freshness, and flavors were top-tier. A must-experience.
•	Cleanliness & Amenities: Rooms were spotless, beds comfortable, and all amenities including spa, sauna, and swimming pool were well-managed and relaxing.
•	Location: You really can’t beat it — central, premium, and peaceful.
•	Special Mention: Paaji (Doorman/Host): A true gem! Right from the entrance, he made us feel at home. He greeted us with a respectful Namaste, handled our luggage smoothly, and opened the doors with genuine warmth. That’s the kind of welcome you expect from a luxury brand.

❌ Where things fell flat:
•	Customer Relations: I emailed my room preferences (pool view, specific requests) well before arrival — but received no response, and none of the requests were honored.
•	Check-In Experience: Disappointing. The receptionist was cold and unwelcoming, no smile, no welcome drink, no personal touch. It felt like we were just another room number to him — not the Leela standard at all.
•	Room Allocation: The main reason I booked Leela was for the view over the swimming pool, and it wasn’t provided even after communicating it in advance.

⚖️ Final Thoughts:

The property is absolutely worth experiencing — beautiful interiors, relaxing amenities, and standout hospitality by individuals like Paaji.
But the front desk team and guest communication need serious improvement if The Leela wants to continue being a name that stands for luxury.

Will I return? Maybe — but I’ll think twice, and only after ensuring better pre-arrival communication.

Will I return? Maybe — but I’ll think twice, and only after ensuring better pre-arrival communication.

text.text:
*Hotel Sea Princess Review: A Coastal Gem*

Located in a prime coastal area, Hotel Sea Princess offers a serene escape with stunning ocean views, lush gardens, and top-notch amenities. Here's a detailed review of our stay:

*Ambiance and Design (5/5)*

The hotel's architecture seamlessly blends modern luxury with coastal charm. The spacious lobby, adorned with elegant decor and soothing colors, sets the tone for a relaxing stay. The open areas are meticulously landscaped, with lush greenery and vibrant flowers adding to the hotel's aesthetic appeal.

Rooms and Amenities (5/5)

The rooms are tastefully decorated with plush furnishings, large windows offering breathtaking ocean views, and modern amenities like flat-screen TVs and minibars. The beds are comfortable, and the bathrooms are clean and well-maintained. Some rooms have private balconies, perfect for enjoying the sunrise or sunset.

Dining (5/5)

The hotel's dining options are diverse, with multiple restaurants serving a range of cuisines from local favorites to international dishes. The seafood restaurant stands out, offering fresh and delicious dishes. The breakfast buffet is impressive, with a variety of options to suit different tastes.

*Recreational Activities (4/5)*

The hotel offers a range of activities, including swimming, kayaking, and beach volleyball. The nearby beach is pristine, with crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming or sunbathing. The hotel's spa and wellness center provides rejuvenating treatments, from relaxing massages to invigorating facials.

*Service and Hospitality (5/5)*

The hotel's staff is friendly, attentive, and professional. From check-in to check-out, the service is prompt and courteous. The concierge team is helpful, assisting with everything from tour bookings to restaurant recommendations.

*Value for Money (5/5)*

Considering the hotel's prime location, luxurious amenities, and excellent service, the rates are reasonable. However, some guests might find the prices slightly high compared to other hotels in the area.

Overall Experience (5/5)

Hotel Sea Princess offers a memorable stay with its stunning ocean views, luxurious amenities, and exceptional service. Whether you're looking for a relaxing getaway or an adventurous escape, this hotel is an excellent choice. With some minor improvements.

*Recommendation:*

Hotel Sea Princess is perfect for:

- Couples looking for a romantic getaway
- Families seeking a relaxing vacation with amenities for all ages
- Travelers who appreciate stunning ocean views and luxurious amenities

*Tips:*

- Book a room with an ocean view for the best experience
- Take advantage of the hotel's recreational activities, like kayaking or beach volleyball
- Try the seafood restaurant for fresh and delicious dishes
- Relax at the spa and wellness center for a rejuvenating experience

In conclusion, Hotel Sea Princess is a coastal gem that offers a memorable stay with its stunning ocean views, luxurious amenities, and exceptional service. With some minor improvements, it's a top-notch choice for travelers seeking a relaxing and luxurious getaway.

text.text:
I am writing to share my experience during my recent stay at your hotel, which lasted over 22 days. While there were several positive aspects, I feel it is important to bring to your attention some serious concerns that affected the overall quality of my stay.

Firstly, I would like to commend your housekeeping team for maintaining a high standard of room cleanliness and hygiene. The breakfast service was also consistently excellent and a highlight of my stay.

However, I was extremely disappointed with the behavior and attitude of the front desk staff. Throughout my stay, I encountered repeated instances of unprofessionalism and rudeness. Unfortunately, the staff at the front desk and room service lacked basic courtesy and communication skills, which made even routine interactions unpleasant. This level of service does not align with the standards one would expect from a reputable establishment.

I sincerely hope that hotel management takes this feedback seriously. The front desk is often the first and last point of contact for guests, and poor service in this area can significantly harm the reputation of your hotel, regardless of the quality of other services.

I trust you will look into this matter and take appropriate steps to ensure a better experience for future guests.

Thank you for your time and attention.

text.text:
**The Allure of Five-Star Hotels: A Luxurious Retreat**

When it comes to luxury accommodations, five-star hotels epitomize grandeur, sophistication, and exquisite service. These establishments do not merely provide a place to stay; they offer an unparalleled experience that elevates hospitality to an art form. A five-star hotel is characterized by meticulous attention to detail, exceptional amenities, and an ability to anticipate guests' needs long before they arise.

Imagine walking into a five-star hotel lobby; the ambiance bathes you in elegance, with marble floors, exquisite chandeliers, and tasteful artwork adorning the walls. The professional staff greets you with warm smiles, ready to cater to your needs. A five-star hotel prides itself on providing personalized service, with staff trained to deliver service that goes beyond expectations. Whether it’s a welcome drink upon arrival, a personalized note in your room, or custom-made itineraries, every element is thoughtfully curated to make you feel valued and pampered.

Accommodations in five-star hotels are nothing short of spectacular. Spacious rooms and suites often come with stunning views, luxurious furnishings, and the latest technology. High-end bedding, plush robes, and well-stocked minibars create an oasis of comfort. Many hotels also offer private balconies, hot tubs, or even dedicated butler services to ensure every guest's desires are met. The bathrooms in these establishments are typically lavish, featuring high-end toiletries, rain showers, and deep soaking tubs, transforming everyday routines into indulgent rituals.

Gastronomy in five-star hotels is a standout feature. Renowned chefs craft menus that blend local flavors with international cuisine, using the freshest ingredients sourced from nearby markets. Many of these hotels boast award-winning restaurants, often with Michelin stars, offering guests gourmet dining experiences. Whether it’s a lavish breakfast buffet, a light lunch by the pool, or a multi-course dinner with wine pairings, dining becomes an unforgettable journey of flavors.

Wellness is another critical aspect of five-star accommodations. Most feature full-service spas, state-of-the-art fitness centers, and serene swimming pools, providing guests the opportunity to relax and rejuvenate. Spa treatments often include signature massages, beauty therapies, and holistic wellness practices designed to promote relaxation and balance. Additionally, many hotels offer bespoke wellness programs, from yoga sessions on the beach to guided nature walks, ensuring guests can unwind both physically and mentally.

Meeting and event facilities in five-star hotels are tailored to host everything from intimate gatherings to grand celebrations. With elegant ballrooms, state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment, and dedicated event planners, these venues ensure that every occasion is memorable. Business travelers benefit from fully equipped meeting rooms and concierge services, making work and leisure seamlessly intertwined.

Finally, the location of a five-star hotel often enhances its allure. Positioned in prime areas—be it a bustling city center, a serene beach, or a scenic mountain—guests can easily explore the surrounding attractions, cultural sites, and natural beauty. The combination of luxurious accommodations, exceptional service, and prime location ensures that a stay at a five-star hotel is more than just a getaway; it’s an experience that leaves a lasting impression.

In summary, a five-star hotel is an epitome of luxury and refinement. From personalized service and exquisite accommodations to world-class dining and wellness experiences, these establishments offer an escape into a world of unparalleled comfort and elegance. For those seeking a unique blend of relaxation and indulgence, five-star hotels stand as a beacon of hospitality excellence.

One of the iconic place I visit in my life. Amazing Amazing Amazing experience. It's a must in life time experience. The view, feel , food, location and the beauty emerged from comfort and hospitality simply cannot be described in words and needs a true experience.
All the staff members, be it from the front desk, housekeeping, signature restaurants, lounges, bell desk, security..etc were all so courteous and exemplified the value of customer orientation and the culture of 'Athithi Devobava'. Can't remember every staff members name who made our stay the most memorable one. Thank you all for making this a wonderful and a memorable stay.

Nestled in the vibrant city of Mumbai, Taj Lands Mumbai is a quintessential epitome of opulence and sophistication. From the moment you step into this architectural marvel, you are transported to a world of refined luxury and impeccable service.

The hotel's grandeur is truly awe-inspiring, boasting tastefully designed interiors that blend classic and contemporary elements flawlessly. The attention to detail is evident in every corner, from the meticulously adorned corridors to the stunning lobby, exuding an aura of sheer elegance.

The guest rooms are a sanctuary of comfort, offering plush furnishings, modern amenities, and breathtaking views of the cityscape. The impeccable cleanliness and well-appointed facilities ensure a truly relaxing stay, leaving no room for disappointment.

The dining experience at Taj Lands Mumbai is nothing short of extraordinary. The restaurants serve a delightful array of culinary masterpieces, crafted by world-renowned chefs. From delectable Indian delicacies to international gastronomic delights, every meal is a journey of flavors that tantalizes the taste buds.

The impeccable service provided by the staff deserves special mention. The warm and attentive nature of the hotel's personnel goes above and beyond to ensure that every guest is pampered and well taken care of, leaving an indelible impression.

Taj Lands Mumbai also offers an array of amenities, including a rejuvenating spa, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and an inviting swimming pool. These facilities provide the perfect balance of relaxation and recreation.

In conclusion, Taj Lands Mumbai is an unparalleled gem in the heart of Mumbai, offering an unforgettable experience of luxury, comfort, and exceptional service. It is truly a destination where dreams come true, and every moment spent here is cherished forever.

text.text:
Luxurious Haven in the Heart of Mumbai: ITC Grand Central Mumbai.
This luxurious hotel is located in the heart of Mumbai, making it a perfect choice for both business and leisure travel. The staff members were attentive, courteous.

The rooms at ITC Grand Central are nothing short of magnificent. Spacious, elegantly designed, and equipped with modern amenities, they offer a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. The attention to detail in the room decor and furnishings was truly impressive, and the bed was incredibly comfortable, guaranteeing a restful night's sleep.

The hotel boasts a range of dining options that cater to all tastes and preferences. From fine dining restaurants offering a variety of cuisines to cozy cafes and trendy bars, there is something for everyone. I had the pleasure of dining at one of the hotel's signature restaurants, and I was blown away by the delectable flavors and impeccable service. The culinary experience was truly a highlight of my stay.

The amenities at ITC Grand Central are top-notch. The fitness center is well-equipped and perfect for maintaining your workout routine while traveling. The spa offers a tranquil oasis where guests can indulge in rejuvenating treatments and massages. The rooftop swimming pool provides a refreshing escape from the bustling city, offering panoramic views of Mumbai's skyline.

One aspect that stood out to me during my stay was the exceptional level of service provided by the hotel staff. From the concierge desk to the housekeeping team, every staff member I encountered was friendly, professional, and attentive. They were always ready to assist with any request or inquiry, making me feel truly valued as a guest.

The location of ITC Grand Central Mumbai is another advantage. Situated in the Parel neighborhood, it offers easy access to various attractions, shopping centers, and business districts. The hotel also provides a complimentary shuttle service to nearby locations, which is a convenient perk for guests.

In conclusion, ITC Grand Central Mumbai is a haven of luxury and hospitality in the bustling city of Mumbai. The exquisite rooms, outstanding dining options, top-notch amenities, and impeccable service make it a standout choice for discerning travelers. Whether you are visiting for business or leisure, I highly recommend this hotel for an unforgettable stay.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hilton Mumbai International Airport hotel during my business trip, and I must say it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. This hotel truly exceeded my expectations in every way, and I am delighted to share my positive review.

From the moment I arrived, I was warmly greeted by the friendly and attentive staff. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and I was immediately made to feel welcome. The hotel's elegant and modern decor created a sophisticated ambiance that was both inviting and comfortable.

The room I stayed in was spacious, well-appointed, and impeccably clean. The plush bed provided the perfect night's sleep, and the soundproofing ensured a peaceful and uninterrupted rest. The attention to detail was evident throughout the room, with thoughtful amenities and a well-stocked minibar.

One aspect that truly stood out during my stay was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff. They were genuinely committed to making my stay memorable and went above and beyond to meet my needs. Whether it was arranging transportation, providing local recommendations, or attending to any request, the staff was always prompt, courteous, and professional.

The dining options at the Hilton Mumbai International Airport were impressive. The breakfast buffet offered a wide variety of delicious choices, catering to different dietary preferences. The quality of the food was exceptional, and the attentive staff made dining a pleasurable experience. I also had the opportunity to enjoy a few meals at the hotel's restaurant, and each dish was expertly prepared and presented.

The hotel's location near the international airport was incredibly convenient, especially for business travelers like myself. The efficient shuttle service provided by the hotel made it easy to navigate between the airport and the hotel, saving me valuable time. Despite its proximity to the airport, I was pleasantly surprised by how quiet and peaceful the hotel was, allowing me to unwind after a long day.

Additionally, the Hilton Mumbai International Airport hotel offers a range of amenities that further enhanced my stay. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my exercise routine while traveling. The swimming pool provided a refreshing escape from the bustling city, and the spa offered a range of rejuvenating treatments.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend the Hilton Mumbai International Airport hotel. It is a true gem that combines world-class hospitality, impeccable service, and luxurious accommodations. Whether you're visiting Mumbai for business or leisure, this hotel will undoubtedly exceed your expectations. I look forward to returning to the Hilton Mumbai International Airport on my next trip to this vibrant city

Thanks for the service 😍

My recent stay at the Radisson Blu Mumbai international airport was a pleasant experience. Convenient location, just a short drive from the airport. The rooms were spacious, clean, and modern, with comfortable beds and ample amenities. The bathroom was well maintained.
Not a good experience while check in at the reception, I forgot to collect id card, staff returned after some time, I clearly informed to add GST details in the invoice, after check out when I saw the invoice, GST details missing.
The restaurant served delicious food, with a variety of options to suit different tastes.
I recommend the Radisson Blu Mumbai international airport for a comfortable and enjoyable stay in Mumbai.

highlightedText.text: "The rooms were spacious, clean, and met our high standards."

text.text: It's going to be a long one... The name Radisson Blu signifies quality globally. Despite our short stay, the impression left was immense. After traveling for over 14 hours, we booked a night to continue our journey the next day. The rooms were spacious, clean, and met our high standards. What truly elevated our experience was deciding to have lunch at the in-house restaurant. The buffet spread was truly luscious. Despite not planning to have soup that day, I followed the staff's recommendations and tried Khousuey, which was simply amazing. They also kindly served me a soybean soup to taste, which exceeded our expectations. Every dish was fantastic, and the desserts were absolutely mouthwatering. The green tea lime and mango pastry was superb. I've never had any issues with this hotel chain until now, but the experience here in Mumbai has truly won over my heart. Overall, it was the best experience we could have had.

text.text:
If there were ever a destination that epitomizes the epitome of luxury and refinement, it is the JW Marriott Juhu in Mumbai. From the moment you set foot in this magnificent oasis, you are enveloped in an aura of grandeur and elegance that permeates every aspect of your stay. As a seasoned traveler with a penchant for the finest experiences, I can confidently declare that JW Marriott Juhu sets new standards for indulgence and perfection.

The first thing that strikes you is the breathtaking location. Situated along the shimmering shores of Juhu Beach, the hotel boasts mesmerizing views of the Arabian Sea, creating an ambiance that is both serene and captivating. The allure of the coastal landscape is only surpassed by the architectural marvel that is JW Marriott Juhu itself

Upon entering the palatial lobby, you are immediately greeted by warm smiles and impeccable service from the attentive staff. The check-in process is swift and seamless, ensuring that every moment of your stay is optimized for relaxation and enjoyment. And speaking of relaxation, the accommodations at JW Marriott Juhu redefine the concept of opulent comfort. The rooms and suites are tastefully adorned with plush furnishings, sumptuous linens, and state-of-the-art amenities, all meticulously curated to cater to the most discerning guests.

One of the standout features of JW Marriott Juhu is its unparalleled dining experiences. From world-class restaurants helmed by Michelin-starred chefs to charming cafes offering delectable treats, the culinary journey at this establishment is nothing short of extraordinary. Whether indulging in authentic Indian delicacies or savoring international gourmet delights, every meal is an exquisite affair that delights the senses and leaves a lasting impression on your palate.

For those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, the Quan Spa at JW Marriott Juhu is an oasis of tranquility. This sanctuary of wellness offers an array of rejuvenating treatments, blending ancient traditions with modern techniques, to soothe your body, mind, and soul. As you bask in the nurturing hands of skilled therapists, you'll find yourself transported to a realm of serenity and bliss.

Beyond the luxurious accommodations and epicurean delights, JW Marriott Juhu also caters to the needs of business travelers and event organizers. The hotel's state-of-the-art conference and banquet facilities are equipped with cutting-edge technology and a team of seasoned professionals who ensure that every event, whether corporate or social, is executed flawlessly.

It would be remiss not to mention the exceptional level of service that pervades every corner of JW Marriott Juhu. The staff's dedication to anticipating and fulfilling guests' desires is truly commendable. Their unwavering commitment to excellence ensures that your stay is nothing short of magical, leaving you with cherished memories to treasure for a lifetime.

In conclusion, JW Marriott Juhu is a jewel in the crown of luxury hospitality. With its unparalleled location, opulent accommodations, divine dining experiences, and impeccable service, it surpasses all expectations. Whether you seek a romantic getaway, a family vacation or a haven of indulgence, JW Marriott Juhu is a destination that will exceed your every wish. Prepare to be pampered, enchanted and enthralled as you immerse yourself in a world of lavishness and refinement at this remarkable hotel

text.text: I recently stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai and was highly impressed by its blend of luxury, comfort, and professionalism. The check-in process was seamless, with warm and attentive staff ensuring a smooth arrival. My room was elegantly designed, impeccably clean, and featured a plush bed, excellent city views, fast Wi-Fi, and a well-appointed bathroom with premium toiletries. The breakfast buffet offered an extensive selection of fresh local and international options, and the rooftop AER lounge provided a stunning panoramic view of Mumbai’s skyline, perfect for unwinding in the evening. The hotel’s central location made commuting to business meetings and exploring the city convenient. Overall, the Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai delivers an exceptional guest experience, and I would highly recommend it for both business and leisure travelers.

text.text:
A Hidden Gem Amongst Mumbai's Delights: The Lemon Tree Experience

If you're searching for the perfect stay in Mumbai, look no further than Lemon Tree! Situated conveniently close to the airport, this exceptional location ensures you'll never miss a flight and can effortlessly enjoy your time in the city.

Prepare to be pampered by their exceptional service that goes above and beyond expectations. The staff members at Lemon Tree are not only professional but genuinely attentive to your every need. Their warm and welcoming demeanor creates an inviting atmosphere that makes you feel right at home from the moment you step through the door.

Indulge in the oasis of tranquility that is the pool area. Whether it's the enchanting evening hours or the refreshing mornings, spending time by the poolside is an absolute must. Immerse yourself in pure relaxation as you unwind and soak up the serene surroundings.

What truly sets Lemon Tree apart is their delightful complementary breakfast, served at the renowned Citrus Cafe. Prepare to be amazed by one of the best breakfast buffets you'll ever encounter. With an array of delectable options, your taste buds will be tantalized by an exquisite fusion of flavors, satisfying every craving.

The overall experience at Lemon Tree is nothing short of exceptional. It's a place where comfort meets elegance, and where impeccable service intertwines with breathtaking amenities. Whether you're a business traveler or a tourist seeking a memorable stay, Lemon Tree will surpass your expectations and leave you with lasting memories.

So, don't hesitate—immerse yourself in the Lemon Tree experience and allow yourself to be captivated by its charm. Your journey through Mumbai will be elevated to extraordinary heights, thanks to the enchanting allure of this hidden gem.

text.text:
Hotel Lemon Tree Premier in Mumbai is a delightful place to stay, offering a blend of comfort and modern amenities. My experience at this hotel was quite positive, making it a great choice for both business and leisure travelers.

The first thing that struck me was the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The lobby is spacious and elegantly designed, setting a pleasant tone for the stay. The staff members are exceptionally friendly and attentive, always ready to assist with any requests. Check-in was smooth, and I appreciated the quick service.

The rooms at Lemon Tree Premier are well-appointed and comfortable. My room was spacious, featuring contemporary decor and all the necessary amenities, including a flat-screen TV, a mini-fridge, and complimentary Wi-Fi. The bed was particularly comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep after a long day of exploring the city. The cleanliness of the room was impressive, reflecting the hotel's commitment to maintaining high standards.

One of the highlights of my stay was the dining experience. The hotel offers a variety of dining options, including a multi-cuisine restaurant that serves delicious meals. The breakfast buffet was particularly noteworthy, featuring a wide range of options, from Indian dishes to continental favorites.

The location of the hotel is also a significant advantage. Situated in a convenient area, it provides easy access to various attractions, shopping areas, and business hubs in Mumbai.

In summary, Hotel Lemon Tree Premier is an excellent choice for anyone visiting Mumbai. With its friendly service, comfortable accommodations, and great dining options, it provides a memorable stay that caters to the needs of all types of travelers. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a pleasant hotel experience in the city.

text.text:
A Hidden Gem Near Mumbai Airport – Incredible Experience at Brew Code, Holiday Inn

I recently visited Holiday Inn, Sakinaka, and had an absolutely fantastic time at their in-house café, Brew Code — and wow, what an experience!

Even though Brew Code isn’t listed separately on Google Maps, I wanted to leave a review here because everything about it screamed five-star comfort. The moment I walked in, I was struck by the luxurious ambience, high ceilings, beautiful lighting, and king-size seating that immediately put me at ease. It felt like stepping into a calm, classy oasis right in the heart of the city.

The coffee was excellent, and although the hot chocolate wasn’t as rich as what you might find at places like Smoor or Coco Café, the vibe and service more than made up for it. The staff was super courteous, and our order arrived quickly and with great attention to detail.

The valet parking was smooth and hassle-free, and the entire space felt professional, elegant, and welcoming—a perfect spot for a quiet catch-up or a laid-back yet classy coffee break.

While I only visited Brew Code this time, I noticed Saptami, the restaurant right next to it, was buzzing with people and seemed to offer a buffet setup. I’m definitely planning to try that the next time I visit. The overall energy of the hotel—from the entry to the lobby to the café—was so warm and refined that I can’t wait to explore more.

Holiday Inn, Sakinaka, you’re doing an amazing job. Thank you for creating such a peaceful and elevated experience for your guests. Looking forward to coming back soon and discovering even more.

text.text:
Sea Palace Hotel in Mumbai offers a blend of comfort and convenience, with its prime location right on the iconic Colaba Causeway. This charming hotel is perfect for those looking to stay close to some of Mumbai's most popular attractions, such as the Gateway of India and the vibrant markets of Colaba.

One of the biggest draws of Sea Palace Hotel is its **stunning views** of the Arabian Sea. The rooftop terrace is a standout feature, offering panoramic views of the sea and the city skyline. It’s a great spot to relax, enjoy a meal, or simply take in the beauty of the surroundings, especially during sunset.

The **rooms** at the hotel are clean and comfortable, with a cozy ambiance that makes for a pleasant stay. While not overly luxurious, the rooms are well-maintained and equipped with all the basic amenities you might need. The sea-facing rooms, in particular, offer a beautiful view that adds a special touch to the stay.

The **staff** at Sea Palace Hotel are friendly and attentive, always ready to assist with any needs or queries. Their warm hospitality is often highlighted by guests as one of the positive aspects of the hotel.

The **dining options** are also worth mentioning. The hotel's rooftop restaurant and bar provide a lovely setting to enjoy a meal or a drink while soaking in the sea breeze. The food is decent, with a mix of Indian and international cuisines on offer.

Given its **prime location**, the Sea Palace Hotel is ideal for travelers who want to explore Mumbai's famous landmarks and bustling markets. It's within walking distance to many attractions, making it a convenient base for tourists.

Overall, Sea Palace Hotel offers a good balance of location, comfort, and value for money. It's a great choice for travelers looking to experience the charm of Mumbai while staying in a hotel that provides all the essentials with a view that’s hard to beat.

text.text:
Best hotel in Mumbai near airport

Ginger Hotel Andheri East is located off the Western Express Highway and is in close proximity to the railway station, the international airport and the Bombay Exhibition Centre. The hotel also provides convenient access to the city's thriving corporate hub on the Andheri Kurla Road. It offers guests 142 smartly furnished luxe rooms equipped with a multitude of modern facilities and amenities designed for the on-the-go traveler. The hotel offers an all day diner Cafe Et Cetera, a fitness center, a meeting room and services like express laundry.

Mumbai enjoys a temperate throughout the year with extremely heavy rainfall in the months of June and July. The weather becomes warm and humid from April to May. Winters last from November to February when the weather is largely cool and pleasant.

text.text:
We had booked 2 rooms for 3 nights at the Leela and it was an unforgettable experience! My sister and I had taken our aged parents to visit Mumbai for old times sake (they lived in Mumbai for 40+ years before relocating to the south). We were a little anxious how it would turn out since none of us had been to Mumbai in ages but we realized we made the right choice, as soon as we checked in at The Leela!!
From the smooth checkin, the delicious food at Great Wall and Citrus and the SPECTACULAR HOSPITALITY by the staff, through out our stay, made this trip memorable. I was a little concerned that the hotel might be a little dated and not up to modern standards but those fears were soon laid to rest. The hotel is maintained meticulously and the decor is ageless. I am just amazed at the cleanliness and overall attention to detail.

Thank you to the wonderful staff at the Leela. We hope to come back soon!

text.text:
A Seamless Blend of Business and Relaxation

I had a wonderful stay at this resort-style business hotel. It offers the perfect balance between work and leisure. The rooms are spacious, well-designed, and equipped with everything a business traveler needs—from high-speed Wi-Fi to comfortable workspaces—while still feeling luxurious and relaxing.

The conference and meeting facilities are professional and well-maintained, and the staff goes out of their way to ensure everything runs smoothly. After a busy workday, the resort amenities—like the pool, spa, and scenic outdoor areas—offer the ideal way to unwind.

Dining was a highlight, with a variety of options and excellent service. Overall, this hotel is perfect for business trips, corporate events, or even a work-friendly vacation. Highly recommended for those who want comfort without compromising productivity.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Sea Princess, and it was truly a fantastic experience. The hotel's location is perfect—overlooking the serene beach, providing stunning ocean views right from your room. The pool area is beautifully maintained, making it the perfect spot to relax and unwind while enjoying the sea breeze. I was not to happy with the quality of the pool water though!

The rooms are spacious, tastefully decorated, and exude a classy vibe that adds to the overall comfort. The staff here are exceptional—courteous, attentive, and always ready to go the extra mile to make your stay special. From check-in to check-out, the service was seamless, making me feel genuinely cared for throughout my stay.

The location is also excellent, with easy access to local attractions, making it ideal for both relaxation and exploring the city. Overall, I highly recommend Hotel Sea Princess for anyone looking for a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and warm hospitality by the beach.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Sea Princess, and I must say it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment I arrived, the staff greeted me with warmth and professionalism, ensuring a smooth check-in process.

The rooms were spacious, elegantly designed, and offered breathtaking views of the ocean. The beds were incredibly comfortable, and the housekeeping team maintained impeccable cleanliness throughout my stay.

The amenities were top-notch – the poolside area was serene and perfect for relaxation, while the spa services provided an indulgent escape. The hotel’s beachfront location made it even more special, allowing me to enjoy stunning sunsets every evening.

Dining at The Lagoon was an absolute delight! The food was delicious, with a wide range of cuisines to choose from. The breakfast buffet was particularly impressive, offering fresh and flavorful options to start the day right.

The hospitality was outstanding, with every staff member going above and beyond to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Special thanks to the front desk and restaurant teams for their exceptional service!

If you’re looking for a luxurious yet cozy stay in Mumbai, Hotel Sea Princess is the perfect choice. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting the city and will definitely return on my next trip!

text.text:
*Hotel Sea Princess Review: A Coastal Gem*

Located in a prime coastal area, Hotel Sea Princess offers a serene escape with stunning ocean views, lush gardens, and top-notch amenities. Here's a detailed review of our stay:

*Ambiance and Design (5/5)*

The hotel's architecture seamlessly blends modern luxury with coastal charm. The spacious lobby, adorned with elegant decor and soothing colors, sets the tone for a relaxing stay. The open areas are meticulously landscaped, with lush greenery and vibrant flowers adding to the hotel's aesthetic appeal.

Rooms and Amenities (5/5)

The rooms are tastefully decorated with plush furnishings, large windows offering breathtaking ocean views, and modern amenities like flat-screen TVs and minibars. The beds are comfortable, and the bathrooms are clean and well-maintained. Some rooms have private balconies, perfect for enjoying the sunrise or sunset.

Dining (5/5)

The hotel's dining options are diverse, with multiple restaurants serving a range of cuisines from local favorites to international dishes. The seafood restaurant stands out, offering fresh and delicious dishes. The breakfast buffet is impressive, with a variety of options to suit different tastes.

*Recreational Activities (4/5)*

The hotel offers a range of activities, including swimming, kayaking, and beach volleyball. The nearby beach is pristine, with crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming or sunbathing. The hotel's spa and wellness center provides rejuvenating treatments, from relaxing massages to invigorating facials.

*Service and Hospitality (5/5)*

The hotel's staff is friendly, attentive, and professional. From check-in to check-out, the service is prompt and courteous. The concierge team is helpful, assisting with everything from tour bookings to restaurant recommendations.

*Value for Money (5/5)*

Considering the hotel's prime location, luxurious amenities, and excellent service, the rates are reasonable. However, some guests might find the prices slightly high compared to other hotels in the area.

Overall Experience (5/5)

Hotel Sea Princess offers a memorable stay with its stunning ocean views, luxurious amenities, and exceptional service. Whether you're looking for a relaxing getaway or an adventurous escape, this hotel is an excellent choice. With some minor improvements.

*Recommendation:*

Hotel Sea Princess is perfect for:

- Couples looking for a romantic getaway
- Families seeking a relaxing vacation with amenities for all ages
- Travelers who appreciate stunning ocean views and luxurious amenities

*Tips:*

- Book a room with an ocean view for the best experience
- Take advantage of the hotel's recreational activities, like kayaking or beach volleyball
- Try the seafood restaurant for fresh and delicious dishes
- Relax at the spa and wellness center for a rejuvenating experience

In conclusion, Hotel Sea Princess is a coastal gem that offers a memorable stay with its stunning ocean views, luxurious amenities, and exceptional service. With some minor improvements, it's a top-notch choice for travelers seeking a relaxing and luxurious getaway.
